metadata.name: 1st Horseman - Death
metadata.description:
Apocalypse is often confused with the end of times.
The greek word means instead "revelation"

The advent of the creative AI, our beliefs are challenged to the core. 
Is Art something a machine can create?

As the first horseman, death, represents the ceasing of our limiting beliefs and embrace this cultural revolution.

This artwork was realized in a sort of collaboration with the machine. 
Over 100 ai assets were created, 25 of those were selected to manually compose the final piece in post-production.
